name: How to Not be a Hitman
name_original: How to Not be a Hitman
description:
Developer: Jacky Xu, Zhengtong Chen, Evelyn Ko, Ivan Ho

Control:

  • Click on walkable tile around the player to move
  • When standing on throwable (glasses, trash), click the throw button and click on tile around the player to throw
    • This could attract the enemy to move towards the thrown position
  • On level 2&3, the man can use the gun. Aim with the mouse and press 'T' to shoot within specific range

Enemies:

  • Walker: Move around in a specified path, only kill the player when walking into
  • Watcher: Has infinite spot range (can be blocked by walls & obstacles), spotted = death

Other parts:

  • Throwable: usually glasses and paper to throw and attract enemy attention
  • Car: Move each turn, can use to block enemy vision. A new car will appear when the old one drove out of the map
  • Hideable: Trashcan, can use to hide from enemies
